meanings.definition: A person who studies trees and woody plants.
meanings.sent1: The dendrologists love to learn about different types of trees.
meanings.sent2: Many dendrologists work in national parks to study the trees there.
meanings.sent3: The group of dendrologists had a tree-themed party to celebrate their research findings.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the dendrologists were like detectives, examining each tree for clues.
meanings.sent5: The dendrologists' passion for trees is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The dendrologists conducted a survey of the forest.
meanings.sent1: Last week, the dendrologists went into the woods to gather data for their survey.
meanings.sent2: The results of the dendrologists' forest survey were presented at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel followed the dendrologists around, trying to join their survey team.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the forest became quiet, and the dendrologists continued their survey under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rustling leaves accompanied the dendrologists as they worked in the forest.
